name: Return of Spelling Mayhem
description:
Description

2 words 1 is real 1 is not. Can you beat your high score? Our first attempt at a game jam. Submited for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.

Controls

esc to exit full screen
left click to select an answer

Team Credit

Mike Barrett - barretm4-Jack of all trades
Dave Finch - delconis- Lead programmer, Scrum master, project manager, Game design
James Barrett - Resource procurement, Game design, lead scapegoat
Drew Foster - rockinspots- Resource procurement 

Attributions: 2D UI graphics

https://positron.itch.io/steampunk-fantasy-ui-pack 

 Music 

 Abstractionmusic  

http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

Background

PaperBackgound provided by Dan Sevenstar
https://opengameart.org/content/old-paper

Name

Very Well Thought out name "Return of Spelling Mayhem" generated by https://videogamena.me/
